tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_inquiries (
  inquiry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  inquiry_date DATE,
  inquiry_type VARCHAR(50),
  feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  feedback_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE SupportTickets (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    ticket_date TIMESTAMP,
    ticket_status VARCHAR(20),
    assigned_support_agent VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerInquiries (
    inquiry_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    inquiry_text TEXT,
    inquiry_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Feedback (
    feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerSupportTickets (
    ticket_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    ticket_description TEXT,
    assignee VARCHAR(255),
    status VARCHAR(50),
    created_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE SupportAgents (
    agent_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerInquiries (
  inquiry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  inquiry_text TEXT,
  inquiry_date TIMESTAMP,
  resolved BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  feedback_date TIMESTAMP,
  satisfaction_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerContacts (
  contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  contact_type VARCHAR(255),
  contact_date TIMESTAMP,
  agent_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  log_type VARCHAR(50),
  log_date TIMESTAMP,
  log_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerSupportTickets (
  ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  ticket_status VARCHAR(20),
  opened_date TIMESTAMP,
  closed_date TIMESTAMP
)
